fu.util

Class StringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • fu.util.StringUtil

  • public class StringUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Some utilities concerning string processing.

      • convertStr2XML

        public static java.lang.String convertStr2XML(java.lang.String text)
        Converts a text to a string that can appear inside an XML file. This e.g., means, "&" is replaced by "&amp;".
        Parameters:
        text - text
        Returns:
        converted text

      • convertXML2Str

        public static java.lang.String convertXML2Str(java.lang.String text)
        Converts a string that can appear inside an XML file a text to tradional string. This e.g., means, "&amp;" is replaced by "&".
        Parameters:
        text - text
        Returns:
        converted text

        cnt - how long

        cnt - how long

      • stripTrailing

        public static java.lang.String stripTrailing(java.lang.String text,
                                             java.lang.String trailor)
        Deletes a trailing string if it occurs, otherwise returns the original string, e.g., stripTrailing("hello","lo") -> "hel", stripTrailing("hello","la") -> "hello"
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        trailor - trailing string
        Returns:
        text without trailing

      • stripLeading

        public static java.lang.String stripLeading(java.lang.String text,
                                            java.lang.String header)
        Deletes a leading string if it occurs, otherwise returns the original string, e.g., stripLeading("hello","he") -> "llo", stripLeading("hello","ha") -> "hello"
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        header - leading string
        Returns:
        text without leading

      • getLevenshteinDistance

        public static int getLevenshteinDistance(java.lang.String s,
                                         java.lang.String t)
        Computes the Levenshtein between two Strings. Informally, the Levenshtein distance between two words is the minimum number of single-character edits (insertion, deletion, substitution) required to change one word into the other.
        Parameters:
        s - first string
        t - second string
        Returns:
        the distance

      • double2String

        public static java.lang.String double2String(double num,
                                             java.lang.String format)
        Formats a double as string using a certain format (e.g. 0.000).
        Parameters:
        num - the double
        format - the format
        Returns:
        formatted string

      • double2GermanString

        public static java.lang.String double2GermanString(double num,
                                                   java.lang.String format)
        Formats a double as string using a certain format (e.g. 0.000) but creates an output with decimal separator ','.
        Parameters:
        num - the double
        format - the format
        Returns:
        formatted string

      • limitLength

        public static java.lang.String limitLength(java.lang.String text,
                                           int maxLen)
        Limits a string length to the given value. If the string is larger, "..." will be added to the stripped string.
        Parameters:
        text - text
        maxLen - max length
        Returns:
        text, maybe shortened
